_description: AeroDyn Systems - Model Parameters. Organized by category.

speeds._description: Adjustment speeds - how fast each state converges to its target (higher = faster response)

kL.description: Legitimacy & Trust adjustment speed (slow - trust builds/erodes gradually)

kX.description: Incident Accumulation adjustment speed (incidents decay slowly)

kV.description: V&V Maturity adjustment speed (slow - process maturity takes time)

external._description: External factors and shocks - exogenous drivers

ai_boost.description: External AI capability boost (tech breakthrough, vendor partnership)

political_scrutiny.description: External political pressure on ethics (media, parliament, NGOs)

incident_shock.description: External incident trigger (0 = none, 1 = major incident)

base._description: Base rates and efficiencies - organizational constants

coupling._description: Link strengths - how strongly variables influence each other

ethics_constraint.description: Ethics constraint on Targeting (how much low E limits T)

incident_sensitivity.description: How much capability push increases incident risk

vv_protection.description: How much V&V reduces incident probability

data_to_capability.description: How much Data Quality improves capabilities
